sense.def:
To stay somewhere
pomeni še naprej biti na nekem kraju in se ne premakniti drugam.

seg.quote: Fewer women these days stay at home to look after their children.

sense.def:
To stay in a hotel or at someone's house
pomeni krajši čas stanovati v hotelu ali pri nekom doma.

seg.quote: She was staying in a hotel as I was.
We were good friends throughout my stay in Germany.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
stays in a particular condition or situation
, je še naprej v določenem stanju ali položaju.

seg.quote: Last night I stayed awake until the whole house was sleeping.
We'll work till eight if it stays light.

sense.def:
To stay away from a place
pomeni izogibati se nekega kraja.

seg.quote: This town is unsafe: stay away from here.

sense.def:
To stay out of something
pomeni ne se vplesti v nekaj.

seg.quote: We try to stay out of politics.

sense.def:
To stay put
pomeni nekje ostati.

seg.quote: Those kinds of people stay put in one job all their lives.

sense.def:
To stay in
pomeni ostati doma in ne iti ven.

seg.quote: We ought to have stayed in tonight.

sense.def:
To stay on somewhere
pomeni še naprej ostati na nekem kraju.

seg.quote: He had stayed on to have a drink.

sense.def:
To stay out
pomeni ostati zunaj doma.

Kadar delavci
stay out
, ne gredo delat, temveč stavkajo.

seg.quote: The men stayed out for nearly a year.

sense.def:
To stay up
pomeni iti spat pozneje kot navadno.

seg.quote: Willie liked to eat out in restaurants and stay up late.
